message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE 

This paper discusses the use of blockchain technology for enhancing security and privacy in IoT, which falls under the categories of computer security (cs.CR) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The paper proposes a new lightweight and scalable blockchain architecture optimized for IoT, which involves distributed systems (cs.DC) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the implementation and optimization of the proposed architecture, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
